"Intercept the $(0)": "/voice11_voice_navi003_trial_0001_013 We got eyes on the DOLLS Control Ship!"
"/voice11_voice_navi003_trial_0001_020 On top of the Ship, there's its weakspot, the core. You'll need to figure out a way to get on top of it!"
"/voice11_voice_navi003_trial_0001_064 The Control Ship has been destroyed. Great work, see you again!"
"/voice11_voice_navi003_trial_0001_074 It seems they have retreated... Don't worry about it, we'll get them next time!"
"/voice11_voice_navi003_trial_0001_045 It's heating up the ground with its attack! Use the air to jump on top of it!"
